anya-e1001n2:2: Nīti sāro manussānaṃ, mitto ācariyopi ca;
anya-e1001n2:3: Mātā pitā ca nītimā, sutavā ganthakārako.
anya-e1001n2:5: Alasassa kuto sippaṃ, asippassa kuto dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:6: Adhanassa kuto mittaṃ, amittassa kuto sukhaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:7: Asukhassa kuto puññaṃ, apuññassa kuto varaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:21: Sippasamaṃ dhanaṃ natthi, sippaṃ corā na gaṇhare;
anya-e1001n2:22: Idha loke sippaṃ mittaṃ, paraloke sukhāvahaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:24: Bhuñjanatthaṃ kathanatthaṃ, mukhaṃ hotīti no vade;
anya-e1001n2:25: Yaṃ vātaṃ vā mukhāruḷhaṃ, vacanaṃ paṇḍito naro.
anya-e1001n2:27: Dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e1001n2:31: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:33: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:47: Paṇḍite ca guṇā sabbe, mūḷhe dosā hi kevalaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:55: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahu.
anya-e1001n2:57: Vijjā dadāti vinayaṃ, vinayā yāti pattataṃ;
anya-e1001n2:58: Pattattā dhanaṃ pappoti, dhanā dhammaṃ tato sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:61: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatiṃ.
anya-e1001n2:64: Attanīva sabbabhūtesu, yo passati so paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:69: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e1001n2:77: Kiṃ kulena visālena, guṇahīno tu yo naro;
anya-e1001n2:81: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍitaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:84: Vijjāhīnā na sobhante, niggandhā iva kiṃ sukā.
anya-e1001n2:87: Sūrappabhāya ādāso, chāyaṃ disse na mākare.
anya-e1001n2:95: Mahātejopi tejoyaṃ, mattikaṃ na muduṃ kare;
anya-e1001n2:98: Kottho puttena jātena, yo na vidū na dhammiko;
anya-e1001n2:99: Kāṇena cakkhunā kiṃ vā, cakkhu pīḷeva kevalaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:101: Mudunāva ripuṃ jeti, mudunā jeti dāruṇaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:102: No na siddhaṃ mudu kiñci, tato ca mudunā jaye.
anya-e1001n2:104: Sajāto yena jātena, yāti vaṃso samunnatiṃ;
anya-e1001n2:105: Parivattinisaṃsāre, mato ko vā na jāyate.
anya-e1001n2:107: Dāne tapasi sūre ca, yassa na patthito yaso;
anya-e1001n2:110: Varo eko guṇī putto, na ca mūḷhasatānyapi;
anya-e1001n2:111: Eko cando tamo hanati, na ca tārāgaṇo tathā.
anya-e1001n2:114: Tassa putto bhave vasso, samiddho dhammiko suddhe.
anya-e1001n2:117: Pattetu soḷase vasse, puttaṃ mittaṃva ācare.
anya-e1001n2:119: Lālane bahavo dosā, tālane bahavo guṇā;
anya-e1001n2:120: Tasmā puttañca sissañca, tālaye na tu lālaye.
anya-e1001n2:123: Etesu kovido pañño, dhīro pāḷiṃ visodhaye.
anya-e1001n2:128: Candanaṃ sītalaṃ loke, candikā sītalā tato;
anya-e1001n2:146: Satesu jāyate sūro, sahassesu ca paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n2:147: Vuttā satasahassesu, dātā bhavati vā na vā.
anya-e1001n2:150: Sadese pūjito rājā, vidvā sabbattha pūjito.
anya-e1001n2:153: Asataṃ pana sabbesaṃ, dukkhahetu na saṃsayo.
anya-e1001n2:155: Paṇḍite sujane sante, sabbepi sujanā janā;
anya-e1001n2:159: Vinītaṃ yanti sabbepi, ko taṃ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:164: Ambuṃ pivanti no najjo, rukkho khādati no phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:165: Megho kvacipi no sassaṃ, paratthāya sataṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:170: Sataṃ pharusavācāhi, na yāti vikatiṃ mano;
anya-e1001n2:171: Tiṇukkāhi na sakkāva, tāpetuṃ sāgare jalaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:173: Selo yathā ekaghano, vātena na samīrati;
anya-e1001n2:180: Anuyyogena telāni, tilehi na sakkā laddhuṃ.
anya-e1001n2:182: Yathā hyekena cakkena, na rathassa pati bhave;
anya-e1001n2:183: Evaṃ purisakārena, vinā kammaṃ na sijjhati.
anya-e1001n2:185: Uyyāmena hi sijjhanti, kāriyāni na manorathaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:186: Na hi suttassa sīhassa, pavisanti migāmukhe.
anya-e1001n2:191: Mātā sattu pitā verī, yena bālo na pāṭhito;
anya-e1001n2:192: Na sobhate sabhāmajjhe, haṃsamajjhe bako yathā.
anya-e1001n2:204: Byasanena ca mūḷhānaṃ, nidāya kalahena vā.
anya-e1001n2:208: Niddāsīlī sabhāsīlī, anuṭṭhātā ca yo naro;
anya-e1001n2:212: Na hi saṃharate jutiṃ, cando caṇḍālavesme.
anya-e1001n2:214: Yatra vidvajjano natthi, sīlāghyo tatra appadhipi;
anya-e1001n2:217: Ṭhānabhaṭṭhā na sobhante, dantā kesā nakhā narā;
anya-e1001n2:228: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
anya-e1001n2:231: Khippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n2:233: Dullabho purisājañño, na so sabbattha jāyati;
anya-e1001n2:234: Yattha so jāyatī dhīro, taṃ kulaṃ sukha medhati.
anya-e1001n2:240: Bhattaṃ ukkhaliyaṃ pakkaṃ, bhājanepi tathā bhave.
anya-e1001n2:248: Sele sele na maṇikaṃ, gaje gaje na muttikaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:249: Vane vane na candanaṃ, ṭhāne ṭhāne na paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:251: Paṇḍito sutasampanno, yattha atthīti ce suto;
anya-e1001n2:254: Potthakesu ca yaṃ sippaṃ, parahatthesu yaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:255: Yathākicce samuppanne, na taṃ sippaṃ na taṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:257: Uppalena jalaṃ jaññā, kiriyāya kulaṃ naro;
anya-e1001n2:264: Appassuto sutaṃ appaṃ, bahuṃ maññati mānavā;
anya-e1001n2:267: Paṭhame sippaṃ gaṇheyya, eseyya dutiye dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:268: Careyya tatiye dhammaṃ, esā janāna dhammatā.
anya-e1001n2:271: Paññāya atthaṃ jānāti, attho ñāto sukhāvaho.
anya-e1001n2:273: Natthi vijjāsamaṃ mittaṃ, na ca byādhisamo ripu;
anya-e1001n2:274: Na ca atthasamaṃ pemaṃ, na ca kammasamaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:276: Vinā satthaṃ na gaccheyya, sūro saṅgāmabhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:285: Haṃso majjhe na kākānaṃ, sīho gunnaṃ na sobhate;
anya-e1001n2:289: Attānurūpakaṃ kodhaṃ, yo jānāti sa paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:292: Appapūro ghaṭo khobhe, appakhīrā gāvī cale.
anya-e1001n2:294: Na titti rājā dhanamhi, paṇḍitopi subhāsite;
anya-e1001n2:295: Cakkhupi piyadassane, na titti sāgaro jale.
anya-e1001n2:300: Yo sisso sippalobhena, bahuṃ gaṇhāti taṃ sippaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:301: Mūgova supinaṃ passaṃ, kathetumpi na ussahe.
anya-e1001n2:303: Na bhijjetuṃ kumbhakāro, sobhetuṃ kumbha ghaṭati;
anya-e1001n2:310: Vāsitaṃ kānanaṃ sabbaṃ, suputtena kulaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n2:312: Iṇakattā pitā sattu, mātā ca byabhicārinī;
anya-e1001n2:313: Bhariyā rūpavatī sattu, putto sattu apaṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:326: Paccuppannañca yo dhammaṃ, tattha tattha vipassati;
anya-e1001n2:329: Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṃ nātivattati;
anya-e1001n2:335: Dullabhaṃ pākatikaṃ vākyaṃ, dullabho khemakaro suto;
anya-e1001n2:336: Dullabhā sadisī jāyā, dullabho sajano piyo.
anya-e1001n2:344: Apuṭṭho paṇḍito bherī, pajjunno hoti pucchito;
anya-e1001n2:345: Bālo puṭṭho apuṭṭho ca, bahuṃ vikatthate sadā.
anya-e1001n2:349: Cakkhumāssa yathā andho, sotavā badhiro yathā;
anya-e1001n2:354: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:359: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇābhiyyo na maññati;
anya-e1001n2:360: Karaṃ purisakiccāni, so sukhaṃ na vihāyati.
anya-e1001n2:362: Yasmiṃdese na sammāno, na piyo na ca bandhavo;
anya-e1001n2:363: Na ca vijjāgamo koci, na tattha divasaṃ vase.
anya-e1001n2:365: Dhanavā sutavā rājā, nadī vajjo ime pañca;
anya-e1001n2:366: Yattha dese na vijjanti, na tattha divasaṃ vase.
anya-e1001n2:368: Nabhassa bhūsanaṃ cando, nārīnaṃ bhūsanaṃ pati;
anya-e1001n2:369: Chamāya bhūsanaṃ rājā, vijjā sabbassa bhūsanaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:371: Sukhatthiko sace vijjaṃ, vijjatthiko caje sukhaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:372: Sukhatthino kuto vijjā, kuto vijjatthino sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:375: Khaṇacāge kuto vijjā, kaṇacāge kato dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:380: Dhammo jaye no adhammo, saccaṃ jayati nāsaccaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:381: Khamā jayati no kodho, devo jayati nāsūro.
anya-e1001n2:383: Hatthassa bhūsanaṃ dānaṃ, saccaṃ kaṇṭhassa bhūsanaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:384: Sotassa bhūsanaṃ satthaṃ, bhūsane kiṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:386: Videsetu dhanaṃ vijjā, byasanesu dhanaṃ mati;
anya-e1001n2:387: Paraloke dhanaṃ dhammo, sīlaṃ sabbattha ve dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:389: Padose dīpako cando, pabhāte dīpako ravi;
anya-e1001n2:393: Na hi vañjhā vijānāti, guruṃ pasavavedanaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:395: Yassa natthi sayaṃ paññā, satthaṃ tassa karoti kiṃ;
anya-e1001n2:398: Kiṃ karissanti vattāro, sotaṃ yattha na vijjate;
anya-e1001n2:404: Natthi attasamaṃ pemaṃ, natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:405: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā.
anya-e1001n2:410: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano;
anya-e1001n2:411: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, dhīro saddhaṃ nivesaye.
anya-e1001n2:413: Guṇo seṭṭhaṅgataṃ yāti, na ucce sayane vase;
anya-e1001n2:414: Pāsādasikhare vāso, kāko kiṃ garuḷo siyā.
anya-e1001n2:417: Āgatañca bhayaṃ disvā, abhīto hoti paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:420: Malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ, pamādo rakkhato malaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:422: Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
anya-e1001n2:425: Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade;
anya-e1001n2:429: Pantho ca saṅgāmo titthaṃ, aṭṭhete parivajjiyā.
anya-e1001n2:431: Rattoduṭṭho ca muḷho ca, mānī luddho tathālaso;
anya-e1001n2:432: Ekacintī ca bālo ca, ete atthavināsakā.
anya-e1001n2:434: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca, bhīru āmisagaruko;
anya-e1001n2:435: Itthī soṇḍo paṇḍako ca, navamo dārakopi ca.
anya-e1001n2:437: Navate puggalā loke, ittarā calitā calā;
anya-e1001n2:438: Etehi mantitaṃ guyhaṃ, khippaṃ bhavati pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:440: Yo niruttiṃ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:441: Pade pade vikaṅkheyya, vane andhagajo yathā.
anya-e1001n2:455: Nāgo gato naramukhe na jahāti līḷaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:460: Āhāre byavahāre ca, cattalajjo sadā bhave.
anya-e1001n2:465: Jaheyya pāpake mitte, bhajeyya paṇḍite jane;
anya-e1001n2:469: Yādisaṃ vappate bījaṃ, tādisaṃ harate phalaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:471: Chando nidānaṃ gāthānaṃ, akkharā tāsaṃ viyañjanaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:474: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ hitamattano;
anya-e1001n2:477: Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena sahasaṃvase;
anya-e1001n2:480: Nayaṃ nayati medhāvī, adhurāyaṃ na yuñjati;
anya-e1001n2:481: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1001n2:482: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
anya-e1001n2:498: Tathā sakalavijjānaṃ, dhammassa ca dhanassa ca.
anya-e1001n2:500: Paṇḍitā dukkhaṃ patvāna, na bhavanti visādino;
anya-e1001n2:501: Pavissa rāhuno mukhaṃ, kiṃ no deti puna sasī.
anya-e1001n2:503: Javena assaṃ jānanti, vāhena ca balibaddhaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:506: Manasā cintitaṃ kammaṃ, vacasā na pakāsaye;
anya-e1001n2:509: Anabhyāse visaṃ vijjā, ajiṇṇe bhojanaṃ visaṃ;
anya-e1001n2:510: Visaṃ sabhā daliddassa, vuddhassa taruṇī visaṃ.
anya-e1001n2:511: Cattāro pañca ālope, ābhutvā udakaṃ pive;
anya-e1001n2:514: Yassa eso pasutopi, guṇavā pujjate naro;
anya-e1001n2:524: Na vade dakādī natthīti, mukhe ca vacanaṃ tathā.
anya-e1001n2:526: Sabbaṃ suṇāti sotena, sabbaṃ passati cakkhunā;
anya-e1001n2:527: Na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro, sabbaṃ uccitu marahati.
anya-e1001n2:532: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ attamattano;
anya-e1001n2:533: Yoniso vicine dhammaṃ, evaṃ tattha visujjhati.
anya-e1001n2:536: Ārohati na yo saka-vaṃsaagge dhajo yathā.
anya-e1001n2:544: Narattaṃ dullabhaṃ loke, vijjā tatra sudullabhā;
anya-e1001n2:545: Kavittaṃ dullabhaṃ tatra, satti tatra sudullabhā.
